headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin for the Philips Hue Sync Box. Important: TV accessories must be added to HomeKit manually, the logs show the pin for adding them (should be the same pin as for the plugin).

syncBoxIpAddress.title: IP Address
syncBoxIpAddress.description: The IP address of your Philips Hue Sync Box.

syncBoxApiAccessToken.title: Access Token
syncBoxApiAccessToken.description: The access token that you get while registration.

defaultOnMode.title: Default ON mode
defaultOnMode.description: The mode that is used when switching the Sync Box on via HomeKit. Possible values are 'video', 'music', 'game' or 'lastSyncMode'.

defaultOffMode.title: Default OFF mode
defaultOffMode.description: The mode that is used when switching the Sync Box off via HomeKit. Possible values are 'powersave' or 'passthrough'.

tvAccessory.title: Enable HDMI TV
tvAccessory.description: Enables a TV Accessory for switching the inputs of the Sync Box.

tvAccessoryLightbulb.title: Enable lightbulb for HDMI TV
tvAccessoryLightbulb.description: Enables an integrated lightbulb for the TV Accessory.

modeTvAccessory.title: Enable Mode TV
modeTvAccessory.description: Enables a TV Accessory for switching the modes of the Sync Box.

modeTvAccessoryLightbulb.title: Enable lightbulb for Mode TV
modeTvAccessoryLightbulb.description: Enables an integrated lightbulb for the TV Accessory.

intensityTvAccessory.title: Enable Intensity TV
intensityTvAccessory.description: Enables a TV Accessory for switching the intensity of the Sync Box.

intensityTvAccessoryLightbulb.title: Enable lightbulb for Intensity TV
intensityTvAccessoryLightbulb.description: Enables an integrated lightbulb for the TV Accessory.

entertainmentTvAccessory.title: Enable Entertainment Area TV
entertainmentTvAccessory.description: Enables a TV Accessory for switching the entertainment area of the Sync Box.

entertainmentTvAccessoryLightbulb.title: Enable lightbulb for Entertainment Area TV
entertainmentTvAccessoryLightbulb.description: Enables an integrated lightbulb for the TV Accessory.

updateIntervalInSeconds.title: Update Interval
updateIntervalInSeconds.description: The interval in seconds in which the plugin checks for updates.

apiServerEnabled.title: Enable API
apiServerEnabled.description: Enables an HTTP API for controlling the Sync Box.

apiServerPort.title: API Port
apiServerPort.description: The port that the API (if enabled) runs on

apiServerToken.title: API Token
apiServerToken.description: The token that has to be included in each request of the API. Is required if the API is enabled and has no default value.
